lines.text: ...Well, that concrete totally did the job of making sure we couldn't check what tattoos he had.
Maybe the idea was to stop us from figuring out what kind of wizard he was!
What- he set up a whole thing to fool us into thinkin' it was a <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone</c> backfire, but...
...he didn't want us knowing what kind of wizard he was?
Uh... hm, yeah, that sort of contradicts...
But fooling <c=#FF00FF>us</c> into thinking that... maybe he...?
